settings.title: Meet the team
settings.text:
Every email, every DM, every phone call; you'll interact with us directly. Valerie and Liz initially met when Liz was a custom order client a while back. Liz has been on the other side of the custom order process and can help you find the answers to your questions. Omar is our studio pup and loves coming to our events to help be a greeter.
We invite you to our studio  where you can meet all of us in person!

settings.title: One-of-a-kind!
settings.testimonial: Exceptional and one-of-a-kind selection. Kind and warm reception from the staff. I look forward to acquiring another piece from you soon.
settings.name: Marta

settings.title: Truly Special
settings.testimonial: Beautiful, distinct pieces that I will treasure forever! I found VM while looking for a sustainable, locally owned jeweler for my engagement ring. It was a huge bonus that VM is also woman and black owned. In our family of 5, we all now own at least one piece of VM jewelry which are all timeless. I love supporting our local artists and THIS one is truly special.
settings.name: Keriche

settings.title: Exceptional Experience
settings.testimonial: I recently ordered a diamond band for my husband to celebrate our 10 year wedding anniversary. Everything about my experience with the team at Valerie Madison - the quality, attention to detail, communication, customer service - was perfect! We will definitely shop with them again, I highly recommend VM!
settings.name: Kristine

settings.title: Best Customer Service
settings.testimonial: Valerie Madison makes beautiful jewelry, and has the BEST customer service. My wife and I visited the shop on a trip to Seattle and bought a one of a kind ring, it was shipped to us, and we were incredibly happy with it! Honestly can't say enough good things about this shop, the jewelry, and the people.
settings.name: Joe

settings.newsletter_title: Can we add you to our mailing list?
settings.newsletter_text: Every month we share new products, news, upcoming events, and special promotions. We love creating our newsletter each month and would love for you to see it.

settings.title: Precious Metals
settings.icon_subtext: We work exclusively with rare and valuable precious metals, with a focus on primarily recycled 14k & 18k gold. We believe gold is a luxury investment, therefore we only use solid gold - never vermeil, plated, or filled.

settings.title: Diamonds & Gems
settings.icon_subtext: Working with trusted gemstone suppliers, we hand-select all of our unique natural diamonds and sapphires and are committed to disclosing all we know about a stone‚Äôs origin and treatment.

settings.title: What to Expect
settings.icon_subtext: We welcome all individuals and couples to work with us on special pieces to commemorate engagements, commitments, and beyond. Our approach is consultative and transparent. When you work with our team, you will feel at ease and confident in their expertise.

settings.title: Precious Metals
settings.icon_subtext: We work exclusively with rare and valuable precious metals, with a focus on primarily recycled 14k & 18k gold. We believe gold is a luxury investment, therefore we only use solid gold - never vermeil, plated, or filled.

settings.title: Diamonds & Gems
settings.icon_subtext: Working with trusted gemstone suppliers, we hand-select all of our unique natural diamonds and sapphires and are committed to disclosing all we know about a stone‚Äôs origin and treatment.

settings.title: What to Expect
settings.icon_subtext: We welcome all individuals and couples to work with us on special pieces to commemorate engagements, commitments, and beyond. Our approach is consultative and transparent. When you work with our team, you will feel at ease and confident in their expertise.

settings.title: The Details
settings.column_details_left:
What makes emeralds so rare and precious is their signature green hue. Chromium and vanadium are the trace elements responsible for this. These elements are found deep within the earth‚Äôs surface and in very small quantities.

Emeralds typically form in hydrothermal systems, where mineral rich fluid seeps into fractures of the surrounding host rocks. Under the right temperature and pressure conditions, emeralds form out of the solution.

This makes the emerald a unique masterpiece of mother nature and, believe it or not, more rare than diamonds. Emeralds are found in many different countries including Colombia, Russia, Zambia, and Brazil.¬†
settings.column_details_right:
Emeralds should be reserved for those who understand the delicateness and great care required for this stone. The types of high value and quality emeralds selected at Valerie Madison for our rings makes them pieces that should not be worn everyday, to prevent risk of damage. If you are thinking about purchasing an emerald, you need to be aware of the care they require to ensure the longevity of your piece.¬†

If you are someone who does not wear jewelry regularly, or is hard on your hands, we do not recommend an emerald for your engagement ring; or any everyday ring for that matter. We offer a variety of more durable gems to choose from, including green sapphires and diamonds. You can browse our online selection of stones¬†here.¬†

settings.column_header_left: How to Find your ring size
settings.column_details_left:
1. Only you can determine what fits you absolutely best. A ring should slide on fairly easily and have some resistance when taking it off over the knuckle. These sizers don't have 1/4 sizes, so note that the dash means a half size!


2. Your finger should feel no tightness while wearing a ring. No one else should be able to pull your ring off easily but it shouldn't be difficult for you personally to remove.


3. Wide rings fit more snugly than narrower rings.¬†We recommend using the appropriate ring sizer width to find your size or try adding ¬º-¬Ω size to measurements taken with a narrow ring sizer. When in doubt, give us a call and we can help make a recommendation.¬†


4. It‚Äôs not unusual for rings to fit differently through the day or in different seasons, depending on where you live. Your ring may fit snuggly¬†in the heat¬†and it may spin loosely in the colder winter months.
settings.column_details_right:
Temperature
Body temperatures affect¬†blood circulation, so your finger size may be larger when you are warmer and smaller when¬†you are cooler.¬†

Season
If you live in an area with strong differences between seasonal temperatures, you may find that your fingers are skinnier in the winter time and more full in the summer time. It's not uncommon for finger sizes to change 1/4-1/2 ring size so opt for your largest finger size to accommodate the warmest times of year and just be¬†conscious that there just may be some times of year where your ring fits more perfectly than others.¬†

Diet and time of day
It's not uncommon to wake up with fingers feeling swollen, especially if you had a salty meal for dinner the night before. The best time to have your fingers sized is late afternoon when you may be more hydrated and body changes are more likely to be stable.¬†

Activity level
Ever notice your fingers swelling after a long walk or workout? That's your circulatory system properly working and pushing blood into your extremities and fingertips. We don't recommend wearing jewelry during exercise but we understand that it happens sometimes and you want to be sized in a way that will allow for these changes.

settings.column_details_left:
Resizing a ring smaller:
A portion of the ring will be removed from the bottom of the band and the ring will be soldered back together again and reconstructed into a circular shape, polished, and returned to you.

If pav√© diamonds are set into the band, we want to avoid needing to resize down too far as we risk stretching and loosening the diamond settings in the process of making the ring round again with a new smaller circumference and the stones may fall out over time. We take special precautions to retighten these settings during the resizing process but it's important for you to know that once these settings have been stretched during resizing, they technically aren't as strong as the original ring.¬†

Resizing a ring larger:¬†
A portion of the ring will be¬†added¬†to the bottom of the band and the ring will be soldered back together again and reconstructed into a circular shape, polished, and returned to you.¬†

Adding metal to a ring means you will now have two solder seams¬†at the base of your ring. For this reason, as long as pav√© diamonds aren't involved, we generally prefer to size down rather than up.¬†
settings.column_header_right: Can I resize my ring more than once?
settings.column_details_right:
Can I resize my ring more than once?

We recommend limiting resizing as much as possible. Rings will become unstable if you resize them too many times.¬†Ideally a ring would not be resized more than once in your lifetime but we understand issues may come up and we will communicate any concerns if we have them.¬†

Have any questions? You can¬†send us an email at¬†hello@valeriemadison.com¬†or call us at (206) 395-6359

settings.custom_ring_size_text: Don‚Äôt see the size you need? Fear not, we are happy to offer inclusive sizing. Please email us to begin your custom order.

settings.agreement_description:
By checking this box, you agree that this ring is considered a Custom Order and as such, all sales are nonrefundable and are final. We will be following your express instructions to create this ring and will be in touch with you to send CAD renderings and any additional photos and video as requested. All rings will be shipped with a Certificate of Authenticity declaring the materials used.¬†

Turnaround time on Design Your Own Rings is 6-8 weeks.
settings.fewer_boxes_gift_text: It's okay to combine multiple items into fewer boxes
settings.final_sale_description: By checking this box, you agree that this item is considered final sale and as such, all sales are nonrefundable and not exchangeable.

settings.cta_mailto_body: Hi there, I‚Äôd love to use this ring as inspiration for my future custom order. Can you share an estimated quote for this design? My desired budget is _______.

settings.title: Valerie Madison
settings.description: I love my job, especially when choosing gemstones! I hand-select every stone you see in our designs with beauty and quality being my top considerations. I have a degree in Environmental Science & Resource Management making me a great advocate for our planet. I also enjoy shopping for leopard-print tops, collecting fossils and crystals, practicing my Spanish, and tending to my indoor jungle at home.

settings.title: Liz Ferris
settings.description: I lead our Sales Team and am the Store Manager for our charming Madrona showroom.¬†I met Valerie in 2017 and joined her as employee #2 just shortly after, it‚Äôs been an incredible experience to see the VM brand grow through the years. When I‚Äôm not at work I love reading and cuddling my kitties Theodore & Beatrix.

settings.title: Lauren Forbes
settings.description: I am the staff gemologist (aka gem nerd) and sales associate who can help answer all your jewelry questions, write your appraisal, or source the perfect stone for your ring.¬† When I‚Äôm not in the studio you can find me teaching fitness classes, making Spotify playlists, writing, or watching the newest episode of Dateline. ¬†

settings.title: Amara Palmer
settings.description: I fell in love with vintage and ethically made fine jewelry in college. To adorn yourself in it marries the stunning beauty our planet provides us with a sentimental meaning you attach. As a sales associate, I am excited to share the craftsmanship at VM. When not at work, you can find me practicing minimalism with maximalist design, lounging with my cat Miss Cleo, collecting tea, and learning how to parallel park!

settings.title: Nina Hartman
settings.description: I am quiet, dedicated, and passionate about working with my hands. I wake up every day excited to put all my love and positivity into the things I make. I‚Äôve lived in Seattle most of my life, except for the 4 years I spent at the Rhode Island School of Design. When I‚Äôm not making jewelry, I run, bike, knit, play piano, and drink caffeinated beverages. Sometimes I‚Äôm a little too serious.

settings.title: Saraya Ittidecharchoti
settings.description: I keep track of inventory and ship your orders! A few things I enjoy include curating my wardrobe, making clothes and plant care. You can find me cutting up my old bed sheet to sew into pants or rotating my begonia collection for maximum sun!

settings.title: Charlotte Muller
settings.description: I make the shiny stuff. When I‚Äôm not goldsmithing for Valerie Madison or working in my own jewelry studio, I‚Äôm either DIY renovating my mid-mod dream house or in my kitchen testing new recipes. I couldn‚Äôt remain at the top of my game in every way without the support of my handsome cat, clever dachshund puppy and my amazing husband to be.

settings.title: Laura O'Clair
settings.description: I get to take pictures of sparkly things for a living! Each day I wake up feeling blessed, with the intention of bringing more beauty into the world through my work at VM. I focus on contributing in creative and playful ways that add value to the company. After hours, my time is spent going on spontaneous adventures and decorating unconventional cakes for friends and family.

settings.title: Sue Pess
settings.description: I am here to keep things running smoothly and in-step with our growth trajectory. My decades long background in jewelry production, retail, and small business operations make this a great place for me to have a positive impact. When I am not here you can find me thrifting, laughing at my cats, and spending time with friends & family.

settings.title: Adriana Ortiz
settings.description: I love that my job combines building community through digital media and getting to play with beautiful sparkling things. I‚Äôm excited to bring an analytic and strategic mindset to Valerie Madison Jewelry‚Äôs digital presence while working alongside such kind humans. Outside of work you‚Äôll find me probably on my couch watching something sappy, reading, scrolling TikTok and/or shopping for shoes online.

settings.title: Megan Cosgrove
settings.description: As the face of VM‚Äôs Customer Service Department, I strive to make your experience unforgettable. My sense of humor and colorful personality helps ensure that you will be taken care of no matter what! I love to help individuals find lifelong custom rings or commemorate milestones in gold. When I am away from work, you can find me hunting for vintage clothing, obsessing over my dog or impulsively dying my hair.

settings.title: Danielle Nielsen
settings.description: I love that my job is a combination of connecting with our customers and getting to show case such beautiful, ethically sourced and unique jewelry. Before working for VM, I never pictured myself in the jewelry sales world but I am so grateful that life has brought me to where I am. Working alongside this wonderful group of women has taught me so much in just a few short months. When I‚Äôm not selling sparkly pieces of gold, I am either discovering new restaurants to add to my ‚Äúfoodie lovers list‚Äù, taking walks to catch the sunset or getting new tattoos.

settings.title: Omar Little
settings.description: I like to visit the office and zoom around looking for snacks and butt scratches. Everyone is always so excited to see me when I visit so I'm happy that I'm able to please!

settings.title: Meet the Valerie Madison Team
settings.text:
These are the lovely folks that make VM a wonderful place to work in and serve our clients.

Are you interested in joining our team? Click here to see what roles we have open or send your resume to joinus@valeriemadison.com

settings.title: Title 2
settings.description: Some jazzy copy about this recipient persona.

settings.title:
Celebrating your
Love Stories in Gold.
settings.intro_content: Whether it‚Äôs proposing to the love of your life, marking a special occasion in gold, or truly treating yourself with a gem as amazing as you are, we‚Äôre here for it.
settings.body_content: With an eye for balance, durability, and function, Valerie's inspiration comes from the beautiful spectrum of colors of diamonds and gemstones she sources as well as the geometry and shapes they come in. All jewelry tells a story and we believe in fine jewelry as an expression of the desire to decorate oneself with metals and jewels that reflect the love and style you want to reflect outwards.

settings.title: About Valerie
settings.content: Valerie merges contemporary technology with skillful artistry to create elegant designs inspired by classic styles. With her keen eye for detail and passion for individuality, her designs celebrate not only the beauty of life and love but also the natural world and the stunning gemstones that come from it. A Valerie Madison piece features styles and stones not seen in traditional pieces, such as rose-cut diamonds, uniquely shaped stones, vibrant hues, and more. Valerie is a Black Latina and proud to be diversifying the jewelry industry with her Seattle small business.
Valerie begins making beaded jewelry for fun and selling on Etsy and farmers' markets.
Valerie takes her first class to learn how to be a metalsmith.
Valerie takes the leap to become a full-time jewelry designer and changes the business name to Valerie Madison Fine Jewelry
Valerie moves her business into her first jewelry studio
Valerie hires her first assistant bench jeweler.
Valerie sells her first engagement ring.
Valerie moves into a cozy private showroom with a studio loft for herself and her studio assistant, Liz.

Valerie signs the lease for her first retail store and begins renovating while maintaining the e-commerce business. In June, after the murder of George Floyd, Valerie's online store saw quadrupled sales and national exposure as a Black-owned business. Valerie opened Washington's only Latina Black-owned fine jewelry store in October 2020 with 7 employees.
Valerie Madison Fine Jewelry has 12 employees and continues to grow.

settings.title: Community
settings.content: We believe in kindness, diversity, and fresh perspectives for our customers who seek to celebrate life‚Äôs big moments and commemorate all kinds of love.

settings.title: Craft
settings.content: We create vibrant, elegant, and novel designs that are desirable not only because of how different and individualistic they are, but also because they are made with high quality materials and designed to ensure they can be worn for generations. We have an eye for detail that won‚Äôt be surpassed.

settings.title: Conscience
settings.content: Valerie graduated from the University of Washington with a B.S. in Environmental Science & Resource Management. A love of the Earth is in our DNA! We use recycled metals, conflict-free diamonds, Australian & Montana sapphires, and more, sourced through reputable and trustworthy vendors.

settings.title: Valerie
settings.description: I pinch myself everyday to see if I'm dreaming because I love my job and hope that you can see that passion come through in every aspect of my company. From choosing gemstones to designing our company newsletters, I'm involved with all of the creative facets of my business. Outside of work, I love dinosaurs, practicing my Spanish, and tending to my indoor jungle at home.

settings.title: Liz
settings.job_title: Head of Sales & Business Development, Store Manager
settings.description: I lead our Sales Team and am the Store Manager for our charming Madrona showroom. I met Valerie in 2017 and joined her as employee #2 just shortly after, it‚Äôs been an incredible experience to see the VM brand grow through the years. When I‚Äôm not at work I love reading and cuddling my kitties Theodore & Beatrix.

settings.title: Lauren
settings.description: I am the staff gemologist (aka gem nerd) and Director of Diamonds & Gemstones who can help answer all your jewelry questions, write your appraisal, or source the perfect stone for your ring.  When I‚Äôm not in the studio you can find me teaching fitness classes, making Spotify playlists, writing, or watching the newest episode of Dateline.

settings.title: Amara
settings.description: To adorn yourself in jewelry marries the stunning beauty our planet provides us with a sentimental meaning you attach. As a custom sales specialist, I will guide you through the process of creating your dream family heirlooms with care and transparency. Outside of work I love lounging with my husband and cat Miss Cleo, taking long walks, curating my wardrobe, reading, and dreaming of maximalist interiors.

settings.title: Nia
settings.description: I‚Äôm a life long lover of sparkles, gems and all things pretty, so I‚Äôm thrilled to be working with all the beautiful jewelry here at VM. In my spare time, I teach yoga and dabble in graphic design. When I‚Äôm not working, you can find me thrifting around local markets, cooking, or candle making!

settings.title: Adriana
settings.description: I love that my job combines building community through digital media and getting to play with beautiful sparkling things. I‚Äôm excited to bring an analytic and strategic mindset to Valerie Madison Jewelry‚Äôs digital presence while working alongside such kind humans. Outside of work you‚Äôll find me probably on my couch watching something sappy, reading, scrolling TikTok and/or shopping for shoes online.

settings.title: Christina
settings.description: I take video content of everything that happens at Valerie Madison to share to our growing followers on social media. I love creating a story with our beautiful and unique jewelry for everyone in the world to see. When I am not creating video content, you can find me taking photos, baking macarons, hanging out with my family and friends and exploring the latest restaurants in Seattle!

settings.title: Saraya
settings.description: I keep track of inventory and ship your orders! A few things I enjoy include curating my wardrobe, making clothes and plant care. You can find me cutting up my old bed sheet to sew into pants or rotating my begonia collection for maximum sun!

settings.title: Megan
settings.description: I am responsible for managing our website's user experience and product launches. I strive to create a seamless shopping experience that is reminiscent of stepping into our lovely Madrona storefront. When I am not glued to my computer, you will find me chasing Biscuit (our office dog) around Seattle or trying out a new restaurant with my other half.

settings.title: Sue
settings.description: I am here to keep things running smoothly and in-step with our growth trajectory. My decades long background in jewelry production, retail, and small business operations make this a great place for me to have a positive impact. When I am not here you can find me thrifting, laughing at my cats, and spending time with friends & family.

settings.title: Nina
settings.description: I am quiet, dedicated, and passionate about working with my hands. I wake up every day excited to put all my love and positivity into the things I make. I‚Äôve lived in Seattle most of my life, except for the 4 years I spent at the Rhode Island School of Design. When I‚Äôm not making jewelry, I run, bike, knit, play piano, and drink caffeinated beverages. Sometimes I‚Äôm a little too serious.

settings.title: Omar
settings.description: I like to visit the office and zoom around looking for snacks and butt scratches. Everyone is always so excited to see me when I visit so I'm happy that I'm able to please!

settings.title: Our Team
settings.description: These are the lovely folks that make VM a wonderful place to work in and serve our clients. Send an email to joinus@valeriemadison.com if you are interested in becoming a part of our team.

settings.title: Visit Our Store
settings.content:
Walk-ins welcome! We have a variety of everyday fine jewelry, wedding bands, engagement rings, and lovely gifts available in store available for you to browse!

We recommend booking an appointment if you are seeking an Engagement Ring or Wedding Band(s) so our team can be available to assist you - book one (or two) below!¬†

settings.title: Endless Sparkle
settings.content:
Our welded permanent jewelry offers a clasp-less option that is quickly becoming a wardrobe staple. Our team will custom-fit and painlessly weld a solid gold chain to your wrist, finger or ankle. Our styles span from dainty to bold, so you can find the chain of your dreams. All of our chains are 14K solid gold, never plated or filled. Intended to be worn forever, but can easily be removed with scissors. Please note the eternity rings are removable and not a true permanent style.

Appointments are strongly encouraged for all chain options and you can book an appointment below. Our appointments slots are for 1-2 people. Please book additional appointment slots for parties larger than 2 people.

settings.title: Consultation
settings.content:
You can join us in person at our Madrona store or virtually. During your 30 minute appointment we‚Äôll help with any questions, show you ring settings that match your lifestyle and aesthetic, and determine what types of diamonds and gemstones¬†will meet your preferences. You'll leave the consultation with a design direction based on your requests and¬†our next steps are to curate a selection of gemstones.¬†

*We require a¬†$250¬†non-refundable¬†procurement fee to begin searching for your perfect gem through our trusted network of gemstone and diamond dealers.

settings.title: Stone Selection & Deposit
settings.content:
Our team will present you with stone option and you will choose one for your custom ring! The time frame will depend on how difficult the stone search may be. Once you confirm your stone we will draft your Deposit Invoice and send you our Custom Order Contract.

*At this point that we will request 50% nonrefundable deposit* via an online invoice (which can be paid for with a debit/credit card or Paypal) to start producing your custom ring.¬†

settings.title: CAD Review & Approval
settings.content: We will share with you digital mock-ups (called CAD renderings) of your ring to review and approve via email. Up to two adjustments are allowed¬†before additional CAD fees of $250 are requested. Once you approve your design, we will spend the next few weeks casting, polishing, and setting stones. We will send you an update when the ring is completely finished.

settings.title: Final payment & shipment (or pick-up!)
settings.content:
The last and most exciting step! After your final payment we will have your ring shipped or ready for in-store pickup.

We will provide you with a lovely ring box, ring material documentation, information on our warranty, care and cleaning. We are happy to offer complimentary cleanings and check-ups on your ring for a lifetime.

settings.cta_text: Let‚Äôs get started! Send us a message.

settings.title: Seattle‚Äôs only BIPOC Fine Jeweler
settings.text:
Founded by a Black Latina woman, we are strongly rooted in our craft and community. We offer a wide range of innovative designs along with exceptional customer service.

Our bridal collection ranges from bespoke diamond engagement rings and unique sapphire engagement rings to lab-grown moissanite rings. We truly offer something for everyone, from ready-to-ship designs to custom rings.

Our approach to making jewelry includes using recycled metals, quality accent stones, and consciously sourced stones to create elegant, sophisticated, and vibrant heirloom-quality pieces.

settings.title: What is it?
settings.content: We are excited to offer heirloom diamond reworks to our clients. We would love to help you use the diamonds that have been passed down or gifted to you and set them in one of our engagement ring settings, provided they meet certain conditions. Heirloom reworks are either deconstructed from an original ring or set with a loose heirloom diamond into a modern VM setting. This process renews a sentimental piece of history into a contemporary style making them easy to integrate with your unique personality. It is also the most sustainable choice for an engagement ring when set in our recycled metals.

settings.text: Contact us to set-up an in-person or phone appointment to discuss your rework and talk to our Staff Gemologist to see if your stone is a good candidate for a rework.

If your diamond is determined to be a good fit, our Staff Gemologist will conduct an In-House Assessment. This step ensures it will be safe to proceed, it is not a guarantee we will be able to use your diamond.

If the diamond passes the in-person assessment, the next step is to confirm details of the setting and sign the Heirloom Rework Liability contract. We take every measure to ensure it's safety along the way.

Once approved, you will pay the deposit for the rework and any applicable fees.We will proceed with unsetting your stone (if necessary), sending you CAD designs for approval and casting and setting the new ring!
After 6-8 weeks, the ring is completed and ready to enjoy! You may choose to add-on an appraisal if you wish. (Note that all unused metal and small accent diamonds will be returned to you.)

settings.title: How much does it cost?
settings.answer: Custom Heirloom Reworks start at $1,800 - most reworks are $2,500-$6,000

settings.title: Is my diamond a good contender?
settings.answer: We accept reworks on a limited case-by-case basis. If your diamond meets the criteria listed above it is not a guarantee we will be able to create a rework for you. However, our team will be transparent with you.

settings.title: How long does it take?
settings.answer: Heirloom reworks take our standard 6-8 weeks.

settings.title: Can you use my accent diamonds or melee?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, we are unable to use stones smaller than 0.50ct. Any accent stones will be returned to you.

settings.title: Do you re-use my gold?
settings.answer: All original metals will be returned to you. We don't specialize in refining metals - the process of melting them down.

settings.title: Can we do this process if I'm not in Seattle?
settings.answer: Yes! We can definitely work with you remotely. You will be responsible for shipping your ring / diamond at your cost.

settings.title: Are there additional fees?
settings.answer: If your stone requires further assessment, we will discuss an additional non-refundable assessment fee. An optional appraisal ($150) can be purchased separately.

settings.title: Will the rework come with an appraisal?
settings.answer: Appraisals often required by insurance companies and are conducted by our Staff Gemologist for $150. Appraisals add 1 week to the completion time.

settings.title: Can you set a diamond a bought online?
settings.answer: We do not sell our settings separately, Heirloom Reworks are a way to combine our expertise with your sentimental stones, please respect the artisanship of our work.

settings.title: DO YOU OFFER FINANCING?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we¬†partner with Affirm¬†to provide 3, 6, or 12 month financing options on items listed on the website.¬†

settings.title: WHEN WILL MY ORDER SHIP?
settings.subtitle: Every item in our shop has current production times listed within the description. These dates are an accurate time frame for when to expect your order to be¬†shipped by, based on the day you purchase. The shipping speed depends on the option you select during checkout. If you require your item to be delivered by a specific day, we recommend letting us know in the order notes or reach out to us via email at hello@valeriemadison.com

settings.title: HOW DO I KNOW IF MY ORDER HAS BEEN SHIPPED?
settings.subtitle: A shipping email confirmation will be sent when your order has shipped. This confirmation will include the tracking number for your package. Please allow up to 48 hours for the tracking information to be updated in the tracking link provided.

settings.title: I LIVE IN THE SEATTLE AREA; CAN I PICK UP MY ORDER WHEN IT'S FINISHED?
settings.subtitle: Yes! You can choose in-store pickup at checkout. You'll be asked to choose a pick-up time when your order is complete.

settings.title: CAN I MODIFY MY ORDER?
settings.subtitle: Please contact us immediately to see if we can change your order. Any changes to your order after 48 hours will incur a $50 change fee per our policy.¬†

settings.title: WHAT IS THE RETURN POLICY?
settings.subtitle: View our full return policy¬†here.

settings.title: DO YOU HAVE A STORE FRONT?
settings.subtitle: Yes! You can visit our storefront in Madrona from Thursday-Saturday. To view our business hours and make an appointment, click here.

settings.title: HOW DO I FIND OUT MY RING SIZE?
settings.subtitle: For the most accurate size,¬†visit our studio. If you're unable to visit we¬†recommend purchasing a¬†ring sizers¬†in your desired width. These sizers are the same that we use in-house and are sent with instructions on how to determine your measurement.

settings.title: DO YOU OFFER RESIZING?
settings.subtitle:
We offer resizing on all rings that are eligible for resizing. If you are unsure, please contact us.

Our resizing for stacking rings can be purchased here. Looking to resize a wedding band or engagement ring? Please follow this link to purchase.

settings.title: WHAT IF I DON'T SEE MY RING SIZE LISTED?
settings.subtitle: Please don't hesitate to reach out if you don't see your ring size available. We can¬†certainly accommodate most sizes as a custom order. Please note that any ring purchased outside of our sizes offered in the drop-down will be considered custom, and final sale.

settings.title: DO YOU OFFER APPRAISALS?
settings.subtitle:
Appraisals are available for $150. They are conducted by¬†our Gemologist Lauren. Let us know if you would like your ring appraised as this service will add 5 business days to your timeline.
Appraisals are required for each ring or band and can be purchased here. ¬†

settings.title: DO YOU OFFER A WARRANTY?
settings.subtitle: Of course!¬†You can read more information¬†here.

settings.title: I HAVE MY OWN STONE; CAN I PURCHASE YOUR RING AS A SETTING?
settings.subtitle: We do not sell our rings unset.¬†

settings.title: CAN I PICK YOUR BRAIN ABOUT STARTING A JEWELRY BUSINESS?
settings.subtitle: Sorry, not at this time.¬†As much as we want to encourage others to hone in on¬†their talents and take that leap of faith, we must spend¬†our limited time prioritizing the clients we serve.¬†

settings.title: ARE YOUR METALS RECYCLED?
settings.subtitle: We‚Äôre committed to using recycled metals from legitimate sources. The only metal we are unable to verify as recycled, is that which is used in our chains.

settings.title: ARE ITEMS SOLID GOLD?
settings.subtitle: Yes, all Valerie Madison pieces exclusively use solid gold. Products are never dipped, plated, or filled. All components including chains, earring posts and backs are solid gold.

settings.title: DO YOU ACCEPT CUSTOM ORDERS?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we do accept¬†custom orders for engagement rings only. We currently offer diamonds and sapphires as center stones and require a procurement fee to begin sourcing a stone. To start the custom process, please fill out our questionnaire.

settings.title: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM COST FOR A CUSTOM ORDER?
settings.subtitle: Our custom orders start at $2,500-$3,500. To inquire about a certain design or stone, please contact us.

settings.title: WHAT'S THE TURNAROUND TIME FOR CUSTOM ORDERS?
settings.subtitle: We require 6-8 weeks in production once your stone is sourced. Depending on how complex of a gem search your project requires, custom orders are best to start at least 3 months in advance.¬†

settings.title: CAN YOU CREATE SOMETHING WITH MY GOLD AND GEMSTONES OR DIAMONDS?
settings.subtitle: We offer limited heirloom reworks with client provided diamonds. We are unable to use client provided metals or stones outside of diamonds at this time.¬†

settings.title: CAN YOU MAKE ME SOMETHING IN PLATINUM?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely! Please find all of our platinum offerings here. If you have a specific request, please contact us.

settings.title: CAN YOU MAKE ENGAGEMENT RINGS OUT OF MOONSTONE, OPAL, ETC?
settings.subtitle: We only work with diamonds and sapphires based on their durability. You can read more about our stone choices¬†here.¬†

settings.text: Review our available chain styles and pricing and select a date.
When placing an order, please note that each order is for each person. Please leave us a note if this is for multiple people!
When you arrive on your selected date during the welding window, we will measure your wrist and cut the chain for a perfect fit.
Our bench jewelers will weld the chain(s) together onto your wrist using our laser welder.
Enjoy!

settings.title: Available Chain Styles
settings.content:
All chains are offered in 14K yellow gold and subject to availability. 

If you have your heart set on a particular style for your appointment, please call our team at 206-395-6359 for up-to-date availability.

settings.title: DOES IT HURT?
settings.answer: Not at all! This process involves arc welder technology that will quickly zap the chain. We take pride in our commitment to the comfort and safety of our clients.

settings.title: WHAT IF I NEED TO REMOVE IT OR IT BREAKS?
settings.answer: We ensure the integrity of our weld before your appointment is complete and have been testing them on our staff for years. However, accidents happen! If you need to remove it or your welded jewelry comes off for any reason, please contact us.

settings.title: CAN YOU TAKE YOUR PERMANENT BRACELET THROUGH AIRPORT SECURITY?
settings.answer: Yes! TSA does not ask you to remove fine jewelry when going through security.

settings.title: WHAT IF I NEED TO GET AN MRI?
settings.answer: Consult your doctor to know if you will be required to remove your permanent jewelry during your MRI appointment. It can easily be cut off with scissors at the jump ring if needed. Contact us if you need to have it reconnected.

settings.title: CAN MY CHILD GET ONE?
settings.answer: Anyone under 13 must be accompanied by an adult.

settings.title: WHAT IF I CHANGE MY MIND?
settings.answer: All sales are final. Please ensure you are ready to commit to this everyday luxury!

settings.title: WHICH METALS TYPES ARE OFFERED?
settings.answer: We offer 14k solid yellow gold - and it's our most popular choice! Any other colors / combinations must be special ordered in advance.

settings.title: WHAT IF I'M ALLERGIC TO GOLD?
settings.answer: If you've ever had a reaction to gold we do not advise you wear permanent jewelry as all of our chains are solid 14k gold.

settings.title: What if I break or lose my bracelet?
settings.answer: We offer 30-day complimentary re-welding for eternity bracelets. After this timeframe, re-welding will incur a fee, and replacements will be the responsibility of the customer. Please get in touch with our team to explore adding a clasp if the permanent bracelet does not suit your lifestyle.

settings.text: 0.50ct or larger
SI2 or higher clarity
must have been passed down or gifted to you, we do not set diamonds purchased online
can either be loose or in an existing mounting
third-party appraisals are preferred but not a requirement

settings.title: Diamond Requirements
settings.description: The criteria required for VM to consider using an heirloom stone are as follows:

Attendees who RSVP will receive a special, limited quantity pearl-themed gift upon arrival!

settings.title: Book an Appointment
Book an Appointment
settings.content: Book an appointment below! Appointments are strongly encouraged for all chain options. This appointment is for 1-2 people total to attend. Please book another slot for more than 2 people.

settings.title: Visit our Seattle store
settings.text: Our bright and elegant flagship store is located in Seattle's Madrona neighborhood. Walk-ins welcome but appointments are encouraged for bridal shopping. View our upcoming events.

settings.title: You're all set! View our timeless wedding trios.
settings.text: We've created modern and one-of-a-kind engagement ring stacks, complete with upper and lower band. Sold as a complete set, or customize your pairing.
